RefParameter.Name: ContinuousConvMode

PossibleValue.Diagnostic: Continuous and Discontinuous modes could not be used at the same time

RefParameter.Description: Enable or Disable the Continuous Conversion Mode

RefParameter.Name: Overrun

PossibleValue.Comment: Previous data is preserved, new data is lost
Previous data is overwritten, new data is kept

RefParameter.Description: Select the behaviour in case of overrun

PossibleValue.Comment: Sampling sampling phase starts after end of converfsion
ADC conversion through the Down Sampler
ADC conversion through the Decimation Filter
ADC Down Sampler data width 12 bits
ADC Down Sampler data width 13 bits
ADC Down Sampler data width 14 bits
ADC Down Sampler data width 15 bits
ADC Down Sampler data width 16 bits
ADC Down Sampler ratio 1, no down sampling (default)
Inversion only for single negative input
ADC input voltage range up to 1.2 V
ADC input voltage range up to 2.4 V
ADC input voltage range up to 3.6 V

RefParameter.Name: EnableRegularConversion
RefParameter.Description: Enable/Disable Regular Conversion

RefParameter.Name: NbrOfConversion
RefParameter.Description: Number of regular channels to be converted

RefParameter.Name: Rank
RefParameter.Description: The rank in the regular group sequencer

RefParameter.Name: WDG2MonitoredBy
RefParameter.Description: For a dedicated channel, the generated analog watchdog configuration will correspond to the sum of all "Monitored" configurations for this channel when the number of ranks is greater than 1.

RefParameter.Comment: Number Of Channel can be monitored
RefParameter.Name: NbrOfChannel_WDG2CONV1
RefParameter.Description: Number of regular channels to be converted

RefParameter.Comment: Number Of Channel can be monitored
RefParameter.Name: NbrOfChannel_WDG2CONV1
